created_by: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community
name: Discovery of a System Time
description: Identifies use of various commands to query a systems time. This technique may be used before executing a scheduled task or to discover the time zone of a target system.
false_positives: Legitimate use of the system utilities to discover system time for legitimate reason
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*time*) OR (process.executable:*\\w32tm.exe AND process.command_line:*tz*))`
